mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.matchid AS "matchid", a.btype AS "btype", a.type AS "type", a.peopleid AS "people.id", a.shengju AS "shengju", a.jushu AS "jushu", a.lun as "lun", p.name as "people.name"
left join bisai_people_note p on p.id = a.peopleid
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bisai_match_result a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
order by lun,shengju desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bisai_match_result( matchid, btype, type, peopleid, shengju, jushu, lun ) VALUES ( #{matchid}, #{btype}, #{type}, #{people.id}, #{shengju}, #{jushu}, #{lun} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bisai_match_result SET matchid = #{matchid}, btype = #{btype}, type = #{type}, peopleid = #{people.id}, shengju = #{shengju}, jushu = #{jushu}, lun = #{lun} WHERE id = #{id}
